name: Ako
description:
Ako is a new-age platformer inspired by old-school video game classics.

Run (and jump) your way through 15 challenging levels spread across 3 unique worlds, whilst trying to collect hidden gems along the way.

Unlock new abilities, outfits, and other secrets as you progress through the game.

Purchase the game once to unlock all content. There are no ads or in-app transactions in Ako.

Gameplay trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0m9Hhf3JN-Q
Ako website: http://www.ako-game.com
